input.sentences: our day started at the festival with our little girl excited .
there was a stage and performers that were playing .
the dragon character was greeting my girl .
the festival had a model building that looked very interesting .
the little girl rode the horse on the ride .
output.sentences: Chinese festivals are so much fun over here!
There's a lot of things to do, and fun bands to listen to.
Not to mention, it's not a real festival without some of the dragons!
I probably spent all day here just in awe at everything.
And my daughter had the most fun on the merry-go-round.
